Class CBookingConfirmationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.CBookingConfirmationController

extends java.lang.Object

    Author:
    Kristiyan Tomov

      • bookings

        private java.util.ArrayList<Booking> bookings
        The list of bookings that have been made. They could be more than one because ordering 3 seats for example is considered as doing 3 bookings since 1 booking allows for only one seat. The maximum number is less or equal to 12 which is the total number of seats.
